Member Function Documentation

static void Persistence::persist (  const std::string &  fullyQualifiedFileName = "mcdbms.db"  )  [static]
 

This function writes out all data in the instance container to our persistent store.

  • fullyQualifiedFileName The Fully-qualified name of a file to write the data to. This has a default value of "mcdbms.db".

static void Persistence::restore (  const std::string &  fullyQualifiedFileName = "mcdbms.db"  )  [static]
 

This function loads the InstanceContainer with data that is in the specified file.

  • fullyQualifiedFileName The Fully-qualified name of the mcdbms database file to restore.
